title: Ep. 34 | 2 Bears 1 Cave w/ Tom Segura & Bert Kreischer
description: Tom Segura and Bert Kreischer start off this episode of 2 Bears, 1 Cave by discussing their hair loss and weight gain over the years. Tom shares YMH All-Star Robert Paul Champagne's cool new content with Bert. Then Bert breaks down his new favorite commercial. They also discuss losing their virginity, decaf coffee, men's wigs, 85 South, and UTIs. Also, the 2 Bears baseball caps are available sooner than you think!
author: 2bears1cave@gmail.com (2 Bears 1 Cave)
